titleStmt.title: Despatch from Robert S. Newton to L de R du Verge, November 3, 1883

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Despatch from Robert S. Newton to L de R du Verge
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p: As soon as I have answered all my despatches and get my reports &c &c on the Congo sent have I will forward you the United States Despatch Book and Seal, and well thank you to be good enough upon receiving the same to send me a full receipt and also an Inventory of all property belonging to the Untied States Government which I delivered to you when leaving St Paul de Loanda.
Trusting you will still keep god health, and that your business will increase daily

I remain Sir
Yours respectfully
(Signed) L de R du Verge
